versos: (approach) Hebrews 4:16 - "Let us then approach Gods throne of grace with confidence, so that we may receive mercy and find grace to help us in our time of need.";;;
(aug) Sorry, but the word "aug" does not appear in the Bible.;;;
(molech) Leviticus 18:21 "You shall not give any of your children to offer them to molech, and so profane the name of your God: I am the Lord.";;;
(mankind) Genesis 5:2 - "He created them male and female and blessed them. And he named them 'mankind' when they were created.";;;
(customs) Romans 13:7 - "Give to everyone what you owe them: If you owe taxes, pay taxes; if revenue, then revenue; if respect, then respect; if honor, then honor.";;;
(idols) 1 Corinthians 12:2 - "You know that when you were pagans, you were led astray to the mute idols, however you were led.";;;
(reap) Galatians 6:7 - "Do not be deceived: God cannot be mocked. A man reaps what he sows.";;;
(executed) "He executes justice for the orphan and the widow, and shows His love for the alien by giving him food and clothing." - Deuteronomy 10:18;;;

(rimmon) 2 Kings 5:18 - But may the Lord forgive your servant for this one thing: When my master enters the temple of rimmon to bow down and he is leaning on my arm and I have to bow there alsowhen I bow down in the temple of rimmon

(glean) Ruth 2:2 - "And Ruth the Moabitess said to Naomi, 'Let me go to the fields and pick up the leftover grain behind anyone in whose eyes I find favor.' Naomi said to her, 'Go ahead, my daughter.'";;;

(grape) Isaiah 65:8 - Thus saith the Lord, As the new wine is found in the cluster, and one saith, Destroy it not; for a blessing is in it: so will I do for my servants' sakes, that I may not destroy them all.;;;
(rob) "Do not rob the poor because they are poor, or crush the afflicted at the gate," - Proverbs 22:22 NRSV;;;
(rebuke) Revelation 3:19 - "Those whom I love I rebuke and discipline. So be earnest and repent.";;;
(avenge) "Do not take revenge, my dear friends, but leave room for Gods wrath, for it is written: 'It is mine to avenge; I will repay,' says the Lord." - Romans 12:19;;;
(diverse) Romans 12:6 - "Having then gifts differing according to the grace that is given to us, let us use them: if prophecy, let us prophesy in proportion to our faith.";;;
(wizards) Leviticus 19:31 - "Do not turn to mediums or seek out spiritists, for you will be defiled by them. I am the Lord your God.";;;
(aram) 2 Kings 19:9 - Now Sennacherib received a report that Tirhakah
(balances) Proverbs 16:11 - "Honest balances and scales are the Lord's; all the weights in the bag are his work.";;;
